title: Cornelius Castoriadis
summary: Cornelius Castoriadis[lower-alpha 1] (Greek: Κορνήλιος Καστοριάδης;[lower-alpha 2] 11 March 1922 – 26 December 1997) was a Greek-French[1] philosopher, social critic, economist, psychoanalyst, author of The Imaginary Institution of Society, and co-founder of the Socialisme ou Barbarie group.[108]
